com.leestone.twittermention
Class DatabaseAssist

java.lang.Object
  com.leestone.twittermention.DatabaseAssist

public class DatabaseAssist
extends java.lang.Object

The DatabaseAssist Class contains all the functions used to store items in the datastore, then read from it.

Author:
Lee Stone
Date Created:
24th December 2009
Last Updated:
24th December 2009

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
static void createStoredItem()
          Creates the initial stored item using all the defaults.
static java.lang.Long getLastMentionId()
          Looks in the datastore for the ID of the last received mention.
If no ID is found, it is the first time the program has been run, so it creates a brand new entry using a manually entered Status ID and continues from there.
static void storeLastMentionId(java.lang.Long statusId)
          Stores the ID of the last mention received.

Constructor Detail

DatabaseAssist

public DatabaseAssist()
Method Detail

getLastMentionId

public static java.lang.Long getLastMentionId()
Looks in the datastore for the ID of the last received mention.
If no ID is found, it is the first time the program has been run, so it creates a brand new entry using a manually entered Status ID and continues from there.

Returns:
Long the ID of the last mention that was received and processed

storeLastMentionId

public static void storeLastMentionId(java.lang.Long statusId)
Stores the ID of the last mention received.
This actually performs an update rather than a new insert.

Parameters:
statusId -

createStoredItem

public static void createStoredItem()
Creates the initial stored item using all the defaults.
